title: Analyze Refinery Emission Event
description: An environmental engineer investigates an alert from a CEMS (Continuous Emissions Monitoring System) indicating an exceedance of SO2 limits from a flare stack.

tasks.description: Retrieve the CEMS data for the flare stack for the past 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: A timeseries chart of SO2 emissions is displayed, showing a clear spike.

tasks.description: Correlate the emission spike with operational data from the associated process unit to find the root cause (e.g., a unit upset).
tasks.expected_outcome: The emission event is linked to a compressor trip in the sulfur recovery unit.

tasks.description: Draft a report for the environmental regulatory agency detailing the event, cause, and corrective actions.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant regulatory report is generated.
